features: One 32 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Body Builder Mango Shampoo
Gently cleanses hair while giving it a boost of volume
Made with a plant-based blend of botanical ingredients like mango, papaya and other tropical extracts
100% vegetarian formula made without harsh ingredients like parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Alba Botanica Body Builder Mango Hawaiian Shampoo gently cleanses hair while giving it a boost of volume. No drying formaldehydes or damaging sulfates here – just a blend of botanicals to give you soft, nourished hair. Mango, papaya and other tropical extracts work to replenish vitality for hair that is left bouncy and volumized. Our 100% vegetarian formula is pH-balanced and is not tested on animals, and it doesn't contain any parabens or phthalates. Includes one 32 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Body Builder Mango Hawaiian Shampoo. At Alba Botanica, our product family constantly evolves alongside health, beauty, and ingredient knowledge and trends. We’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. Do beautiful – that’s the motto that motivates our body loving products that nourish the skin, hair and, of course, the soul.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Body Builder Mango Hawaiian Shampoo For big, beautiful hair, take a permanent vacation from harsh, drying sulfates in ordinary shampoos. Instead pick up your style with this gentle, botanical cleanser that will lift away heavy grime and dulling deposits. Enriched with mango, papaya and other tropical extracts, this formula is shown in testing to help hair maintain all-day body and fullness**. Welcome to boosted volume and beautiful bounce!

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list No Harsh Sulfates* We believe in using natural ingredients and not harsh sulfates that can damage the hair and scalp. Products that have too strong of a sulfate presence have been known to break down naturally occurring oils in your hair and scalp. At Alba Botanica, we provide products that advocate for a healthy scalp and healthy hair, without using harsh sulfates. *see ingredients list

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Hawaiian Body Builder Mango Conditioner Hawaiian Drink-It-Up Coconut Milk Shampoo Hawaiian Colorific Plumeria Shampoo Hawaiian Go Smooth Gardenia Shampoo More Hawaiian Hair Care Products from Alba Botanica This product conditions hair while also giving it a boost of volume. With coconut milk, which is high in fatty acids and protein, this shampoo locks in moisture to strengthen your hair and reduce breakage. This shampoo gently cleanses and intensely conditions hair to lock in color, replenish moisture and restore softness. Our lightweight shampoo gently cleanses and nourishes hair with botanical treats like gardenia, pineapple and papaya.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only shampoo I’ll ever buy ♡
reviews.reviewText: - Leaves my hair scalp squeaky clean without that stripped hair feeling.- The smell! So yummy.- Lathers quickly- Rinses out easily and doesn’t leave any traces of shampoo behind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent of this shampoo. It’s stronger than the coconut and less strong than the gardenia which is too perfumey for me. This shampoo works best as a “clarifying” type shampoo for my hair (wavy/curly and a little oily) and does dry it out a little if I use it daily. I switch between this and the coconut or gardenia after the coconut started to leave my hair a little sticky after using it for more than two years. Possibly combination with hard water, I haven’t figured it out yet. The gardenia is more smoothing and silky but the scent is too strong for me (although otherwise pleasant) so I will likely stick with this and the coconut to alternate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells really good
reviews.reviewText: Makes your hair very soft. Smells good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good value and smells yummy like mango candy. It does weigh my curly hair down a bit, but the smell is a delight, and my hair gets clean and is very soft. Probably not the best product of you are looking for volume, at least with curly hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE HOW CLEAN MY SCALP FEELS!
reviews.reviewText: IF YOU WANT A CLEAN SCALP THIS IS GREAT..BUT...IF YOU WANT YOUR HAIR NOT TO BE ALL DRIED OUT THIS IS NOT WHAT YOU WANT. IT HAS ORANGE OIL IN IT SO THIS WILL DRY OUT YOUR HAR AS WELL AS BE SUNLIGHT SENSITIVE MEANING IF YOU PLACE ANY ORANGE OR LEMON IOL ON YOUR HAR WHEN YOU ARE IN THE SUN THE SUN WILL BE MORE DAMAGING TO THE HAIR. CITRUS OILS DRY OUT HAIR SO BE CARFUL.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely poor packinf via amazon
reviews.reviewText: Amazon no longer has to care about quality anymore as they are bigger than ever. I will never order anything directly from them, instead I will pay more to have someone who cares about quality ship this to me. Each time i have bought this product from amazon, they have failed to secure the top and there is shampoo everywhere in the box and if they ship it with anything else everything else is unprotected and covered in shapoo. You spend half an hour cleaning everything up and youve lost half the bottle.The product itself is very nice smelling and feels great on your hair. I will purchase again--just NOT from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don’t know how well this product works because it arrived with cap off leaking all over the place.
I received a much smaller bottle then described . I thought it was a good deal until I seen I got ripped off by quantity .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Very good for my child and her sensitive scalp.
La razón principal por la que compré este shampoo es que no tiene sulfatos, no había podido conseguirlo en MX y no dude en comprarlo, mi pelo queda suave y con un rico aroma.
This Company have the best natural products. Excellent quality and a very good prices. I like so much!! I Recommended!!!
